metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6299 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability, which was classified as problematic, has been found inApryse iText 8.0.1. This issue affects some unknown processing of the filePdfDocument.java of the component Reference Table Handler. The manipulationleads to memory leak. The attack may be initiated remotely. The exploit hasbeen disclosed to the public and may be used. Upgrading to version 8.0.2 isable to address this issue. It is recommended to upgrade the affectedcomponent. The identifier VDB-246125 was assigned to this vulnerability.NOTE: The vendor was contacted early about this vulnerability. The fix wasintroduced in the iText 8.0.2 release on October 25th 2023, prior to thedisclosure.

criterions.comment: libitext5-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
